name: Time Lost
description:
In Washington during the late 1960s Alvaro expert in civilization disappeared convinced of the existence of MU and tired of the mockery of his colleagues trying to prove its existence.

In Amazonia he discovers an ancient temple, containing a mysterious artifact. By seizing it, he triggered Ixchel's anger. After overcoming various perils, he finally managed to escape from the temple with the artifact as proof of his discovery and revealed the existence of MU to the world.
